text: “E mmwe Daudi! Chisimu Uwwe tuntesile mmwe kuŵa ŵakulolela pachilambo, basi jilanyani chilikati cha ŵandu mwa chilungamiko, soni ngasinkuya isako (yantima wenu) itakwisa mwainsokonesye kuleka litala lya Allah. Chisimu aŵala ŵaakusokonechela kuleka litala lya Allah, akwete kupata ŵanganyao ilagasyo yaukali nnope ligongo lyakuliŵalila kwao Lisiku Lyachiŵalanjilo.”
